DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare Motivational Enhancement Therapy (MET) with standard drug abuse treatment among pregnant women.
DOC.brief_title: Motivational Enhancement Therapy to Improve Treatment Utilization in Pregnant Substance Users - 1
DOC.criteria: Pregnancy <30 weeks Have not attended drug treatment in past 28 days Not needing residential treatment (except detox) Not at risk for suicide/homicide Have no pending legal charges (except drug treatment)
